pageSubtitle: Submit identity documents to verify your account
kycDisabled: KYC is disabled in this environment. Please check the admin settings if needed.

status.pendingDesc: Your documents are being reviewed. Please wait.
status.rejectedDesc: There was an issue with your documents. Please resubmit.

required.title: Identity Verification Required
required.depositAndWithdraw: Identity verification is required to use deposit and withdrawal features
required.deposit: Identity verification is required to use the deposit feature
required.withdraw: Identity verification is required to use the withdrawal feature

suspended.title: KYC Applications Suspended
suspended.description: New KYC (identity verification) applications are temporarily suspended
suspended.existingUsersDesc: Users who have already completed KYC verification can continue to use all features.

rejected.title: Document Issues Found
rejected.resubmit: Please review and correct your documents, then resubmit.

form.title: Personal Information
form.description: Enter the required information for identity verification
form.phoneNote: With or without hyphens is acceptable

documents.title: Upload Required Documents
documents.description: Please upload the following documents for identity verification.
documents.identityNote: Driver's license, My Number card, passport, etc. (with photo)
documents.addressNote: Utility bill, residence certificate, bank statement, etc. (within 3 months)
documents.cautionNote: Please upload a clear, legible photo

identity.label: 1. Identity Document
identity.description: Please upload a photo ID (driver's license, My Number card, passport, etc.)

address.label: 2. Proof of Address
address.description: Please upload a document showing your current address (utility bill, residence certificate, bank statement, etc., issued within 3 months)

documents.dragDrop: Select multiple files or drag and drop here

toast.saveSuccessDesc: Personal information has been saved successfully.
toast.submitSuccessDesc: Your KYC application has been submitted. Please wait for the review result.

submission.readyDesc: Personal information and required documents have been uploaded. Click the button below to submit your KYC application.
submission.readyResubmitDesc: Personal information and required documents have been corrected. Click the button below to resubmit your KYC application.

checklist.title: üìã Submission Checklist
checklist.note: Complete all items to submit your application

serviceRestriction.title: Service Restriction
serviceRestriction.description: Some services are restricted until identity verification is complete
